metadata.title: USN-3857-1 -- PEAR vulnerability
metadata.description: Fariskhi Vidyan discovered that PEAR Archive_Tar incorrectly handled certain archive paths. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3857-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php-pear - 1:1.10.5+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1.18.04.1 No subscription required
